content.detailedDescription:
1) me and my wife were in japan on vacation. we were on a bullet train traveling by rail leaving osaka, japan.

2)my wife was looking out of the window and noticed a white yellowish object just hovering in the same spot just above the clouds. it didn't move, looked like it was in the exact same spot.She told me to look and we both stared at it for about 10-15 minutes. 

3)when we first saw it we though maybe a plane (or another type of  aircraft ex.Helicopter), or a comet, or maybe a weather balloon. but it didn't move at all, was just hovering in the same spot just above the clouds.Sometimes the clouds would cover it up but than when the clouds separated a little we would see it again.
4)it looked like a oval shaped, maybe a little closer to circular shaped object. just hovering in the sky. it was just hanging there within the clouds. couldn't of been a star, clearly looks like an object and it was still daylight. 

5)when we first saw it we were like, what is that, than we were trying to figure out all the things it could be and ruled everything out b/c this didnt move at all, just stayed in one place, any other airborne object would do some sort of movement. than we starting to realize what if this is some kind of ufo or classified govt plane no one has seen yet. b/c nothing other than these 2 things could just hang right there with no movement.Plus it looked really big, it must have been a few miles away from us and the size looked significant even from where we were seated.
  
6) we had a real good view of the object, seated right next to the window. we watched it for about 10-15 minutes hovering and every now and than disappearing into the clouds. it would re-appear and disappear. this went on for about 10-15 minutes and finally we lost sight of it in a large cloud that enveloped the object. we still looked on after to see if we could see it, but the cloud didnt move and that area of the sky was totally covered. after about 5 minutes we stopped looking for it as the train starting turning a little bit away from where we were looking. 

i circled it in on of the photos,and in the other photo u can see it hovering in between the power lines in the foreground in the middle of the picture towards the top.
content.summary: We saw this white yellowish light/craft hovering in same spot for 15 minutes above clouds

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside at around 3:30 am west coast time, in the front yard couldnt sleep, out to pickup newspaper. looked up saw what i thought was a meteor or plant moving up in the night sky, hardly moving. a few days later i realized it should have flashed by...It did not, besides the flames on right side, it looked like it was coming into the atmosphere sideways, size was round, bright, size of a quarter if holding up to the sky. then after a few minutes watching it.... it disappeared! i felt calm, focused, trying to understand what i was looking at. felt lucky to see and wondered what it ment,,,for days after. i have had other sightings in the past.

when i was a 16 yo kif delivering am paper...The guy with glasses, fark suit and tie, somewhat jewish looking came out of nowhere said i was going to help a lot of people 7n my life then disappeared.

lately last few years,in my pool, lookung up at the sun during the summer, saw a black egyptain bug like space ship like in the rays of the sun for several seconds.....I looked away the sun was bight.

i was standing in my front yard, this couple came down the sidwalk. i heard the male said to female partner . look an old man. i have gray hair age at the time 65....They came up to me , they had on old fashion clothes and looked like early 20th century folks in fress and hair styles. they wanted to hand me relious pamlet, i said, " no need" "iam a comitted believer"....In so many words....They left the way they came then disappeared.....The thinh is they didm't gp anywhere else, not next door or around the neighborhood...It was like they came to see me,,,,

a few months ago....4:00 om aprox. i heard someone say "open up" the voice was weird, sound dis-spirited or not human, then i felt a rumble which felt like an earthquake for a few seconds tat semed to move across the room.

a month later around the same time in the morning , i heard, someone say, "what are you going to do now?" it came into my head like a voice being heard.....My wife, was sleeping next to me soundly she did not here it.

about a week or so later late afternoon aound 4-5 pm we both saw a disc, silver gray headed east over the ridge mountain behind our house.

othwise there has been lughts in the nite sky appearing to be not a plane or a star but moving, sometimes jumping in the sky....
content.summary: Looked like plant or meteor, slow l to r with flames r side them disappeared

content.detailedDescription: As i was getting into my vehicle approximately 8 miles west from whiteface, tx and approximately 3-4 miles south of hwy 125 a low flying triangular shaped craft flew almost directly over head at a very low speed headed north-northeast. it was moving so slow i first thought it was about to land. craft made no sound. had bright white lights at each corner. watched for about 2 minutes before craft made more of eastern path but maintained same attitude. watched till i could no longer see the lights.
content.summary: Low flying silent triangle craft

content.detailedDescription: As i was getting into my vehicle approximately 8 miles west from whiteface, tx and approximately 3-4 miles south of hwy 125 a low flying triangular shaped craft flew almost directly over head at a very low speed headed north-northeast. it was moving so slow i first thought it was about to land. craft made no sound. had bright white lights at each corner. watched for about 2 minutes before craft made more of eastern path but maintained same attitude. watched till i could no longer see the lights.
content.summary: Low flying silent triangle craft

content.detailedDescription: My then boyfriend and i were sitting on a towel about three feet from the waters edge on mercer island. we were just talking about various things when i noticed a bright light that flashed off and on and each time it reappeared it was further along the shore across the lake. it started under the bridge that led from mercer island to bellevue washington. it went along the bellevue shore line. i said what is that, as the light started coming toward us at a south west angle. he noticed and said i guess a boat. but the light seemed very bright but continued to blink off and on, and as it got closer my boyfriend seemed to go into a trance. i stood up when it was about fifteen or twenty feet from the shore. it was the brightest light i had ever seen but it was under the surface of the water. the light did not refract as would be normal. it remained a circle of bright light. it blinked off and then on one more time very near the shore. i pulled my boyfriend and yelled at him to run. he finally seemed to come out of the trance and we ran as fast as we could. we ran about twenty yards away and turned. the bright orb was sitting on the towel we had left behind.  it was just a bit bigger then the towel about three and one half feet in diameter. we ran all the way to my parents home and told my mother what had happened. oddly enough rather soon after the incident we seemed to have forgotten it entirely. i had an accident about eighteen years ago and the memory came back. i contacted my then ex-husband and asked him if he remembered. he did but was taken aback because he had also forgotten until i asked about it. after i asked he said it was strange that we seemed to forget. we had both been very afraid at the time. i had felt that if we had not run, we would have just not been there. not dead, just not been there anymore. it was as if we were targeted.
content.summary: Bright orb flashed off then on across lake along shore. then headed at an angle toward myself and my then boyfriend flashing off and then on each time being closer. he seemed to go into a trance. i pulled him up and he came out of it. there is more.

content.detailedDescription: Tonight is october the 30th 2014 and my girlfriend noticed out of ordinary lines in the night sky and than i thought about what she said following on we went inside from 9:05pm until 10:30pm that is when my girlfriend and me went back outside my girlfriend said to me " mike them lines are still in the sky same place same pattern" i thought that's odd and than my back got the chills i couldn't believe my eyes two large lights above my head reflecting the boston pizza restaurant spot lights there clearly resembled a very straight edge between the two lights after half hour of staring at that i saw one quick flash of a chrome black circle in between the two lights in made me scream out loud and my girlfriend didn't know what was wrong but it was alarming i have been talking about the ufo illustrations shown in the paintings at the vatican the sheer "coincidence" has led me to report this because i have known about this agency from a government documentary on world news that is my report and thank you for your time.
content.summary: My girlfriend noticed strange lines in the night sky it was 9:05 we went inside than at 10:30 my girlfriend noticed the same lines in the night sky and than my heart dropped i was looking at two lights larger than jet airline beside one another

content.detailedDescription:
This was my first sighting i think. i was out for a jog when i saw it. unfortunately i didn't have my phone with me. it came out from the west. i got a clear look for about 3-4 mins. it was cigar-shaped and silver in colour like shining silver reflective. it appeared to moving like a satellite smoke no trail or anything. it moved from the west to south east. also, after some time the ufo ejected a  smoke trail which helped it speed up but it didn't look like it required that sort of thurst.The speed was a lot faster than an airplane.It flew straight.  i am posting the co-ordinates i.E. the latitude-longitude here. this sighting happened in mulund, mumbai near the end-border of sanjay gandhi national park , tulsi lake side. if anybody else observed please post.
latitude:19 degrees 11 minutes 15 seconds
longitude:72 degrees 15 minutes 20 seconds
these are mostly accurate
content.summary: Silver cylindrical aircraft at mulund,mumbai at 7.00 am

content.detailedDescription:
i was on my way, with my father, to a small store not far from our house.  no more than 5 minutes away.  we were going to watch sputnik which had been launched that very day, and wanted to get a couple of snacks to eat while waiting to see sputnik. time of day was near sundown.

the object was on the left side of the road next to a small work-shed that was located at the rock quarry. i saw light flashing.  it was almost like a welding light. i paid no attention to it, believing someone was working there and welding something.

on our way back from the little store, we noticed the flashing light was a ufo on the ground, and as we got closer to it, it began to rise.

it was emitting pulsating light. the entire object was enclosed/surrounded by light.

the light became brighter as the object began to rise.  it paused and hovered, then at a high rate of speed shot off into the sky at an angle.  it then zig-zagged. the speed became tremendous. eventually it appeared as only a star in the sky. i kept thinking, "the power is in the light".

my father quickly checked the instruments on the car dash. they seemed to be operating ok.  it was now dark out.

when my father and i arrived back home, my sister and her friend were very angry with us.  they wanted to know why we were gone for such a long time.  i was surprised at their anger, and argued that we had only been gone long enough to get the snacks (rc cola, fritos, and 2 comic books). we had returned home without going anywhere else. they both insisted that we had been gone for two hours.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo on the ground. witnessed taking off into sky. missing time.

content.detailedDescription:
I have to say that i did not personally witness this, nor did i take the video. 
the other day i was watching videos online, and noticed what i thought may have been a bug fly across the screen, although had it been, it would not have been as quick!!Then i thought it had to be a bird or a plane, but it could not be either, as this was almost a light speed even in slow motion. 
i have seen plenty of videos. and no bug, plane or otherwise have ever looked quite like this to me.
this was of a completely different nature, and obviously controlled by some type of intelligence.
now i have been into the ufo phenomenon for a number of years now, but the day i was watching this i was on no ufo kick or anything of the sort, actually i had other things going on.
but once i had seen this and realized what i had found knew that it was big, very big!!! 
now i am no video editor or anything of the nature, but i was able to use my movie maker to slow it to .125x speed. the actual speed of video is 1x.
by slowing the video and even pausing at the right moments, i could clearly see that something was actually there. 
i have to say this has got to be the best video that i have ever seen and am proud to say i discovered it, as i have believed for a number of years now and those around me thought i was a nut. but the proof is in the pudding.
this cannot be refuted nor can it be disputed, as there is also sound as this object flies by at supersonic speeds. in the black and white at the end of the video you can see in very good detail the shape and that it has portals or windows, as well as you can see a plume of vapor of some type being emitted from the object in question.
now i downloaded a software that i have been trying to learn to use and was even able to produce a much slower speed, but was not able to figure out how to do so.
although at that slower speed (which object is still fast), you can plainly see it change direction just @ or around the telephone poles.
when it came in to view it was at top right corner and exited the screen at an even keel just above the building.
i would like to get this in infared video to see if it emits heat and if so where if not the whole thing. i would also like to see as if it is metallic (chromium) with editing software but do not know how.
i have watched this over and over and am in utter amazement and shock as to what i have found.
there are rare opportunities like this in a lifetime and i believe this is one of them and this was mine. 
it was the needle in the haystack for me, i just wish that needle would have been the megabucks, but am still happy about this as well.
if anyone would like to know more on this i do have the video.
content.summary: I found this video online

content.detailedDescription:
About 9:40 wednesday night , i went to the backyard to allow a pee break for my two dogs. i always stargaze while waiting for the dogs to finish.  i noticed a very dim orange-ish light in the northern sky out of the corner of my eye.  had i not been already staring up i would never have noticed it. i suppose my brain registered it as a distant plane or something.  it took a few seconds for my eyes to adjust to what i was seeing:  a pitch black (darker than the night sky) isosceles triangle-shaped ship travelling north-to-south right above me.  it doesn't feel like "flying" is the right word, it felt more like it was "gliding", and i think i say that just because there was zero sound coming from the object, it felt so unnatural and illogical not to be hearing an engine.  were it going slower i might say it was a hang-glider the way it just floated through the air, but the speed of the object was too excessive for that, too fast even for an aeroplane.  it's flight was fast, smooth and constant.  the lights were so very dim that they were difficult to make out unless you were staring straight at it..... the ship's lights wouldn't catch your eye otherwise.  i believe there were 4 lights on each of  the two equal sides of the triangle, though there may have been 5 or 6, i didn't have much time to process those details. 
gauging the ship's size is difficult b/c i have no idea how high up it was.  it was certainly large.... maybe over 100 metres... maybe much much larger.
the ship passed silently above, passing nearly straight over me, roughly north-to-south.  i first locked in to the ship when it was nearly straight above, and had maybe 8 seconds to view it until it passed out of sight in the distance.  
obviously i felt shock for the first  few seconds, and as i processed what i'd just witnessed, i ran inside to tell my wife what i saw.  i should add that i was not under the influence of alcohol or any narcotics, nor was i recently asleep or feeling drowsy.  
it's hard to say how high up the ship was.... based on it's size, speed, and how clear the ship's body was to me, it was in the hundreds of feet high, but that's pure speculation.  the sky was relatively clear so i had no cloud cover to use as a gauge...
content.summary: Pitch black, rectangular, 4 or 5 very dim orangish lights down each side, very fast and utterly soundless,

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north on rt 16 & 302 toward glen and above pear mtn, in front of stanleys hill i saw a couple of glowing golden orbs of light about 1/2 mile up. one faded out, but as it faded. another golden light lit up beside it, then another and another! there was a row of lights in a caternary like line.  then they just turned off, from left to right.  i thought this was odd but really intreaguing as well so i decided to drive to an area with a better view in hopes of seeing the phenomenon again, so i went north to jackson nh and sat at the top of a field with a great wide view of the valley below.
sure enough, a few minutes later the golden lights were back! 

in the sky to the north, probably about 2-3 miles away to the north west.  there was a couple of small blinky lights kind of flashing back and forth a bit.  then the golden lights started. one would light up then another and another and another until again there was a chain.  it was remenicent of flare activity in some ways, but they didnt flicker in any way, just solid gold and very pretty.
content.summary: I was traveling north on rt 16 & 302 toward glen and above pear mtn, in front of stanleys hill i saw a couple of glowing golden orbs of light about 1/2 mile up. one faded out, but as it faded. another light lit up beside it, then another and another!

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out on the back patio to smoke. i stood looking to the north. as a turned my head to the west, i saw a small orb pinkish red in color about the size of a golf ball moving in a straight line form north to south between my apartment complex. it was moving at a steady rate, maybe 15-20 mph? i did not know what the object was at first because i have never seen anything like it before, although i have heard of them. it made no noise, completely silent. at the time i saw it, i ran through a quick list in my mind as to what it was i had seen. i could not come up with any logical explanation. i know it was not a glare, or reflection of any type. its shape, size and color were very distinct. once the object moved past me and beyond the corner of the apartment,i did not immediately look to follow it because i was still processing what i had seen. less than a minute later i went to the corner of the apartment and looked to the south but did not see anything. the event was only about 3-5 seconds in duration.
content.summary: A small orb, glowing pinkish red, silent about 20 feet off the ground moving north to south

content.detailedDescription: Either this was something that had a hold of this near miss object, or, wormhole " gate " opening and closing. at night i saw along ord (bud o'hare ) airport jet pattern area in sjy, there was a abnormally bright star between the tip of the handle of ursa major ( big dipper) and that star far below. this light was stationary as a star and got brighter. after a minute, i flashed my flashlite  then as if it could see my light, the star glowed, brightly, then looked like two c's facing each other type shape. at this time, it faded away! so, did something save us from destruction of a lost meteor, and blasted away from earth? or, was it some kind of gate. i have not seen the area with a star-like form. another satelite, ( you can follow with the naked eye) was moving south, then suddenly turned immediately east toward lake michigan. can man made sattelites turn like that?  and not a ufo but did anyone notice after the skies were silent on 9/11/2001, did anyone see the crescent moon with a star inside, like that flag? i saw that in the morning while looking for the three jets up there.
content.summary: Same day when

content.detailedDescription: i am not sure what i am seeing. it appears on random nights but is not on a regular basis.It is always one bright light surrounded by three smaller lights that seem to orbit the main light and change positions and colors.It always is pretty much stationary.Maybe it could be the space station i am seeing.
content.summary: Appears on different nights but does not seem to have any pattern. main light has other lights orbiting, and changing positions. 3 small lights. circling main light.

content.detailedDescription:
This evening, my husband and i witnessed about a dozen white/light balls/dots coming in and out of focus over the tulsa area around 5 pm. they were right underneath the moon. my husband asked me to look out towards the moon, but just below it, and i saw them there... 

they also began forming almost in a swarm about 5 minutes into the sighting, again, just coming in and out of focus, as if they were there,then not, then back again. but forming patterns and making progressive movements all the while. 

i was curious to know  if sighting like this have been reported as of late... it was pretty incredible- i have never seen anything like it personally. it was almost as if they are partially manifesting, then went away swiftly after. 

we took pictures but the dots were too small.
content.summary: Small pulsating white light orbs. very tiny, non definite shape

content.detailedDescription: Whilst coming to the end of my dog walk we turned into sunningdale avenue in irlam,i noticed something black crawling from the garden of number 64,sunningdale avenue which at first looked like a snake but i thought it can not be so i assumed it was a cat. we were about 35 yards away at this time but i could see it quite clearly as the street lighting has been upgraded to led lighting. it was raining that night for the first time in a month.As my dog and i got nearer to it i noticed it huddled against the garden wall on the pavement, it looked just like a black ball of around 6 inches in diameter, my  curiosity was aroused as its shape didn't look like a cat, as we got closer about 20 feet or so away from it i thought it will now run and hide under a nearby car which was parked nearby but it stayed where it was, until i got whithin 12 feet or so, at this point it started to roll towards us it then shot up in the air and became about 1 inch in diameter by about 3 feet in length it seemed to hang in the air and then started to spin at enormous speed and then dived down into the pavement and was gone. i was stunned and looked for a hole in the tarmac where it had disappeared but there was no hole there.Whilst it was spinning in front of me i saw coloured rings down its length which gave me the impression of lights on its underside.My dog made no attempt to attack this entity and seemed really quiet afterwards.I conclude that what i had seen was the alien equivalent of our mars rover but much more sophisticated. this sighting has been haunting me ever since invading my thoughts as i sleep.There is a good chance of fracking in this area soon so something my happen shortly.My questions remain whether it was being controlled remotely or are they here underground in this region.
content.summary: Alien equivalent of mars rover

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette, sitting in a friends sunroom near 6:45am when i suddenly saw a bright star and another to the left of it appear, alarmed and experienced with ufo sightings, myself and my two friends ran outside to get a glimpse of the bright white light perhaps 100 feet above the ground. we watched the object slowly move to east and increase elevation when the one light turned to two, then four smaller white lights were also visible, at the end of the oval craft was a small red light. my friend videotaped the sighting (although it did not capture well) and watched it until it  disappeared into the horizon. i knew immediately it was a ufo and all three of us were shocked that such an obvious craft was in the daylight. it moved in a straight elevating line west to east.
content.summary: 1 bright white light turned into a visible objectw/ 6 white lights & 1 red ascended into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
One of our electrical contractors where i work was driving home near salem arkansas and noticed several cars pulled over. he stopped to see what was going on and noticed everyone looking up and pointing. he himself witnessed two waves of orange red orbs crossing the sky all together twenty total.
one orb began circling one of the other orbs as they moved off into the horizon.
the event was noted on several facebook accounts.
the person also told me there were triangular craft being seen with three red lights in the area. several other people coming to work saw a hovering triangular craft earlier hovering in a field near the old blytheville arkansas air base at an earlier date.
i had an experience at age six when we lived near the base and have had a very strange passion for anything ufo or extraterrestrial ever since that has driven me to read and talk about the subject many hours of my life.
content.summary: Two waves of 20 orbs in sky moving east to west

content.detailedDescription:
At first thought it might be a weather balloon but virtually stationary overhead moving very slowly to east.   
spotted it laying on my back on picnic table just curious, object still in sight after 30/45 minutes of observation
content.summary: Directly overhead somewhat stationary moving very slowly to east think it is space station

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house watching tv at around 9:30-10pm on october 29th 2014 when i heard low flying aircraft and strange humming and buzzing electro magnetic sounds. the lights in my bedroom kept dimming and getting bright. i look out the rear bedroom window toward the south east and south west and observed a strange low flying craft flashing red and white lights and performing strange maneuvers stopping and hovering, circling the area and returning on similar paths. other craft kept appearing out of mid air, no cloud cover, perfect visibility, no sound. the craft would glow bright white and red and seemed to interact with each other. when 2 craft would get close to each other they would slow down, get very bright glowing intense red and white and move around each other in very strange ways. the lights would get intensely bright while moving and hovering then dim out and vanish. after about and hour or more of watching what seemed like a display or show, 2 very high flying aircraft at very high speed passed over head toward the north and one toward the east and seemed to be spraying some type of chemtrail. after 15 minutes i could literally smell a fowl pungent odor and some type of mist was present very briefly. i remember feeling intense heat and then very cold almost mist like but no clouds at all in the sky. perfectly clear night, the sky seemed to get brighter as this continued on for another hour or more. strange sounds like electric humming would start at a low frequency and then speed up as these craft would seem to appear out of the south west marin mountains, hovering and moving irratically then take a straight line path toward the east. this was the most profound ufo experience in my life and im really trying to process what happened last night. 2 of the craft that appeared earlier in the night seemed to sync up in relation to one another but many miles apart and hover continuously the entire time with 3 white orbs in a vertical formation in between the 2 that were synced up? they almost look like stars but would glow intensely bright white and red. i did notice about 3-4 streaks of light, almost like shooting stars that appeared to come off the craft or from the area in the sky they were hovering. like they warped out at high velocity leaving a streak of light. things finally calmed down and they stopped buzzing about around 12:30. i couldn't bring myself in from the window, i was completely amazed and drawn to what i feel was a display or show by these crafts saying look, we are here, look what we can do. it was amazing. finally i did manage to go lay down and try to sleep but very difficult after this experience.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed multiple ufo's pulsating, hovering, and flying in the south west and south east mt burdel and west marin area of novato, ca.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home then i saw lights.  it looked like a high school football statium lights in the sky.  they were two rows of three white lights stacked on top of the other. then the 6 lights turned into one row of three bigger lights.  as if they morphed into 3 new lights instead of flashing off. then the 3 lights as if they were split like a cell into 6 lights in a straight row.  then it all disappeared.  the sky was very dark and i couldn't make out anything else but it seemed very close.
content.summary: Lights hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog. at the dog park, in the sky i just observed what can only be explained as a yellow/orange light in the form of a pie slice start to shrink followed by a flash of bright white light on the horizon. the slice then shrunk into what looked like a star then disappeared.
content.summary: Just saw the light change shape flash and disappear

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
My family in 1974.  in shelbyville, indiana on the “old rushville road.” 
observed a glowing orange orb (and a police officer.) the orb was larger than a house and hovered over a woods (near blue river) for 15 minutes to ½ hour.
content.summary: Family and police officer observed orange orb, larger than house.

content.detailedDescription:
i was sleeping soundly next to my husband in bed when i woke up noticing i could not move, i was paralyzed.  i observed a black shadow of a figure in 3 dimension around 7’tall thin but slumped over at the bottom of the bed going toward the window.
  i had a terrific headache above and centered over my right eye, deep inside and between my eye lid and top of my eye ball as i observed the black long armed, big eyed creature go through the wall.
content.summary: Woke up noticing could not move.  observed a black shadow of a figure in 3 dimension around 7’tall thin.

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 2013 (2 or 3 times) around greenwood indiana witnessed a large red/white orb with no shape (red was a stable color while the white moved on the object)at around 10:00pm to 11:00pm
the object went up and down 4 times and then dipped and a red lazier traveled slowly to and from her direction taking 10 to 15 seconds each way.
content.summary: Witnessed large red/white orb with no shape...Up & down movement lazier

content.detailedDescription:
The next reported odd thing happening to the family was in december 1991 on the 6th, 13th or 20th (a friday.) 
the witnesses were in a car at 9:30 at night driving on the old fairland road coming from greenwood and approaching the woods before the river.  they observed a large glowing red/orange pulsating ball (larger than a large house.)
then the older of 2 sisters (age 30) woke up very groggy (as coming out of surgery.)  she was sitting on the passenger side of the front seat of the car next to her sister (age 28) (the driver), her sister then woke up saying she was experiencing the same thing.
  after getting their thoughts together but very mystified, they looked in the back seat and observed their 4 children girl (7 or 8), girl (2 or 3), boy (6 or 7) and a boy (2 or 3.)  they were still asleep (remaining so for quite some time.)
  witnesses also noted they were very warm (their skin and clothing.)  the car they were in was very cold with frost on its windows (it was a very cold night) their location was around 35 miles (i will drive it for exact) from the location of their sighting of the red and orange ball.  the time was 2:30 the next morning.  their location was the harvest supermarket parking lot in greensburg indiana.
content.summary: Observed ufo 2130 woke up 0230 35 miles away

content.detailedDescription: It looks like a satellite the sun was shining on it it looks almost like can
content.summary: Taking a break at 750 columbus ohio look up in the sky there was thought i was a star took the picture with a sam sung telephonezoomed in and that's what i saw

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the sky from my balcony about 8pm when i saw a boomerang shape about the same color as some clouds very faint, and there were not very many clouds that night. it was moving from north to south very fast. i could see other aircraft in the sky, then i saw a second ufo this one a orb about the same color as the neerby cloud a few seconds later. both moving about the same speed way faster then any aircraft.
content.summary: I was watching the sky when i saw a boomerang shaped object move from north to south.Then an orb heading the same way.

content.detailedDescription: While viewing the south eastern sky from my back porch i noticed a rather bright twinkling star that had many colors. after staring at it for about a minute, it quickly jerked to the right then was still again. i grabbed some binoculars but couldn't quite make out a shape, it seemed far away, perhaps closer to the dc area.  i saw a thin white line shoot out from it once.  then noticed very small and faint white lights floating and moving around it. i don't know if those were possibly planes or helicopters from that area observing it or if they were connected.  there were about 20 shooting stars that fell in all directions very close to the main "star". the main object would it back and forth, shoot straight up, float downward, and be completely still in between. when it was still, it didn't twinkle as much and would very easily be viewed as a star.  i tried taking pictures and video but my camera doesn't capture any lights at all in the sky. it got brighter when it moved. . i watched it for about 4 hrs as it got smaller as if it was going further away until i lost it among the stars.  3 nights later, i see the same thing only there are 3 large twinkling, "stars" with the same movement behavior. they are spread far apart like part of a constellation.  no visible fainter ones that moved this time.  all are still located in the southeastern skies. i'm very curious as to what these are & where exactly they are flying above.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like objectdancing in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my house when a group of friends walked by and yelled for me to come out and see five objects in the sky.  as i came out the door there was 5 red orbs forming a rectangle sort of. i ran back inside and grabbed the binoculars.  i ran back outside and up the stairs to my sun deck.  i focused in on one object.  as i was doing this the crowd screamed they're changing shapes, oh look two joined together.  i looked up just as those faded.  focusing back on object it suddenly became translucent then was gone, so i quickly focused on the next orb in line.  i could never make out what i was observing, just a very bright round orb.  it never moved, just hovered.  i heard everyone saying only one light was left.  then i observed object become translucent.  it was still red but i could see the sky thru it.  the best way to explain is think of a contact lens on your finger, you can see thru it while still observing the shape of the contact.  then it suddenly became even more translucent and as i watched it never moved but became so transparent i could no longer see it.  i had observed one red object a month earlier in almost the same part of the sky but that was one red object that would hover, then follow a path, then shoot straight up then hover and fade then appear again at beginning of path and do the same ritual three times.
i feel we saw something i can't explain, i live near a marine base so i'm used to seeing different aircraft and helicopters.  i have never seen an object red, hovering, then fading.  it was not normal behavior.  also was definitely not flares.  i know how flares look as training with them occurs frequently in my hometown.
content.summary: 5 red objects, some changed & joined, all became translucent and faded indivual
